projects.title: Internal CRM and Operations Platform
projects.description: Built a modular FastAPI backend with multiple routers covering authentication, customer profile, segmentation, and operational tools. Implemented JWT authentication, RBAC permissions, middleware logging, and request tracking. Delivered multiple client experiences (React web and Flutter Web App) backed by the same API.
projects.safeSummary: A multi-client internal platform for telecom CRM and operations with secure authentication, role-based access, and unified API architecture.

projects.title: Apache Airflow Production Data Pipelines
projects.description: Built and operated multiple production DAGs handling large daily datasets and business critical reporting. Implemented batch processing, safe datatype conversions, duplicate handling, and bulk loading using PostgreSQL COPY patterns. Automated SFTP retrieval, Excel to CSV conversion, ZIP packaging, and email delivery via Office 365 SMTP.
projects.safeSummary: Production ETL pipelines handling large-scale daily data processing with automated ingestion, transformation, and delivery.

projects.title: AI Chatbot Platform
projects.description: Integrated local LLM inference with Ollama for privacy conscious deployments. Built session management for multi turn conversations and structured data extraction from natural language. Implemented modular orchestration and validation layers to support future expansion.
projects.safeSummary: Internal AI chatbot with local LLM inference for privacy-conscious automation and natural language processing.

projects.title: n8n Production Automations
projects.description: Built and operated production n8n automations for telecom operations, turning manual support tasks into reliable, audited workflows. Designed webhook based orchestration that integrates internal APIs and external services, enforces validation and access controls.
projects.safeSummary: Production-grade workflow automations for TechOps integrating APIs, notifications, and audit-ready outcomes.

projects.title: WebKanZ
projects.description: Travel experience platform for discovering and booking unique travel experiences. Built with modern web technologies focusing on user experience and seamless booking flows.

projects.title: Kawkaban Farm
projects.description: Farm-stay booking platform with WhatsApp and Instagram integration. Successfully processed 50+ bookings with automated notifications and booking management.

projects.title: DoduHash
projects.description: SaaS billing automation platform with PDF invoicing capabilities. Streamlines invoice generation and payment tracking for small businesses.

projects.title: Cinemix Movie Streaming
projects.description: Full-stack movie streaming application with user authentication, movie browsing, and video playback. University capstone project graded A+.

projects.title: WikiGulf
projects.description: Information portal for the Gulf region. My first major web project that taught me the value of building something people actually use.

projects.title: Event Hub
projects.description: Event management application for university students. Successfully supported 500+ student users for event discovery and registration.

projects.title: World University Rankings Analysis
projects.description: Data science project analyzing 2000+ universities worldwide. Implemented predictive modeling and data visualization for ranking insights.
